author: pezagency

comments.content:
"Meta Plus" is an old name. The family is now available as "Meta".   
   
Here's a link to [FF Meta Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829235701/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11026.5.25&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=stock.xchng&sampleSize=48) from FontShop, the original source for FontFonts.
